commands.title: where am i?
commands.description: tells you which folder you are in.

commands.title: list things in this folder
commands.description: shows you files and folders present in the current folder.

commands.title: move into another folder
commands.description: changes your current location from one folder to another.

commands.title: create a new file
commands.description: creates a new blank file at where you are in with the name you gave.

commands.title: create a new folder
commands.description: creates a new empty folder at where you are in with the name you gave.

commands.title: delete a file
commands.description: delete the file you named from the folder you are in.

commands.title: delete a folder
commands.description: delete the folder you named with everything in it from the folder you are in.
commands.input_instructions: name of a folder to delete
